data.title: RH 1.5D: Polarized multi-level radiative transfer with partial frequency distribution
data.name: rh

evidence: "RH 1.5D is an open source, massively-parallel radiative transfer code for spectral synthesis in stellar atmospheres."
"For detailed installation and running instructions, please see the online documentation at https://ita-solar.github.io/rh/."
"In addition, if the journal allows it please include a link to this repository."
